channel.title: Get Started on Site Bay Tutorials
channel.description: Recent content in Get Started on Site Bay Tutorials

item.title: Accounts and Passwords
item.description: Email Addresses and Contact InformationSite Bay uses the contact information on file in your account to notify and bill you.

item.title: How to Choose a Site Bay Plan
item.description: Site Bay offers four plans types: Micro, Starter, Business, and Enterprise. All of our features are available for all Site Bay plan types.

item.title: How to Pick a Data Center
item.description: When selecting a data center for your website, it’s important to consider the location of your visitors.

item.title: Site Bay Beginner's Tutorial
item.description: Where can I get help with something not covered here?There is a community of users available to help on Discord.

item.title: How to Start a Web Design Agency
item.description: White Label AgencyAre you a website designer? Start your own web business and charge what you want.
